Sucker

By Krister Axel on November 22, 2012 in Random

I took a ride past the edge of town stopped the car and put my ego down took a walk and a look around I found what I was looking for Everybody wants to be a star I know that because ot's in my heart doesn't matter who the fuck you are we all want to make it If it was a gift you would take it

I've been down and out and sometimes sour but I got skills and I got power ther's a sucker born every hour and I'm not like that so it's not so bad

Survival is the only teacher whiskey's good but love is sweeter I'm on time when I go to meet her and I try to bring a gift No one wants to go unwanted No one starts to not get started If you've been in love you've been broken-hearted but time keeps on picking up speed and we learn from the ways we bleed

I've been down and out and sometimes sour but I got skills and I got power ther's a sucker born every hour and I'm not like that so it's not so bad

I spent time in the handout line I washed dishes for some fucked up guy I stole bread and kisses and bottles of wine but that don't matter to me now because I'm alive and well somehow

I've been down and out and sometimes sour but I got skills and I got power ther's a sucker born every hour and I'm not like that so it's not so bad

these are old lyrics but I am filing them under poetry because I can.
